attributes.action: To remove and stop using images portraying animals to be vicious for the purpose of 'fashion'
attributes.additional_details: There has been a number of retailers selling clothing products displaying pictures of 'vicious' animals, notably the Rottweiler & Doberman. These are not a natural portrayal of these animals and can consolidate peoples fears of these animals. I propose we remove the products from sale and stop pictures like this being used for the purpose of 'fashion'
